attributes.action: Persuade the Law Society to increase their 'six months rule' relating to complaints against solicitors, to five years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the current time limit for complaints against solicitors is unrealistic. The Law Society is funded and controlled by its members. Their defence of the 'Six Months' limit is that it would be 'Unfair' to pursue any complaint against a member.
